title: TOSY Flying Disc - 16 Million Color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, Extremely Bright, Smart Modes, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, Cool Fun Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teens/Kids, 175g frisbee
descriptions:
Introducing the TOSY Flying Disc - the ultimate disc for endless fun and excitement! With its impressive features and characteristics, this flying disc is a must-have for men, boys, teens, and kids of all ages. 

Featuring either 16 million color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, this disc is extremely bright and will light up the night sky like never before. The brightness factor is a whopping 100 times brighter than any other light-up flying disc, ensuring maximum visibility and an eye-catching display. Choose from a wide range of vibrant colors to create a mesmerizing light show.

The TOSY Flying Disc is not just visually stunning, it's also incredibly smart. With smart modes and motion sensors, it offers a whole new level of interaction. Adjust the brightness level to suit your preferences or set a timer mode for added convenience. The motion sensors automatically light up the disc, making it easy to locate and providing continuous illumination during gameplay.

Never worry about running out of power, as the TOSY Flying Disc is rechargeable. With a quick charge duration of just 30 minutes, you'll be back in the air in no time. The play time is equally impressive, allowing for up to a thousand throws or a full 90-minute match. The package includes a USB Type C to C cable for hassle-free charging.

Weighing just 175 grams, this frisbee is lightweight and easy to throw. It meets professional ultimate standards, ensuring optimal performance and precision. Whether you're playing at night, performing freestyle tricks, or engaging in disc games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes, the TOSY Flying Disc is the perfect choice.

Durability is a top priority, and this disc delivers. It is waterproof, making it suitable for outdoor use even in wet conditions. Its high durability ensures it can withstand rough play and last for a long time.

The TOSY Flying Disc is not just a game changer, it's also a fantastic gift idea for Christmas, birthdays, or camping adventures. Its cool and fun design will surely bring joy to anyone who receives it.

Experience the thrill of the TOSY Flying Disc and take your outdoor game to new heights. Get yours today and enjoy endless hours of fun and excitement!

Introducing the TOSY Flying Disc - the ultimate flying disc experience that will take your outdoor play to the next level!

The 36 or 360 LEDs are 100 times brighter than any other light-up flying disc, ensuring maximum visibility even in the darkest of nights.

But that's not all! The TOSY Flying Disc features smart modes that let you customize the brightness level, set a timer, and even enjoy motion sensor technology that automatically lights up the disc. It's like having your very own personal light show every time you toss it!

No need to worry about running out of power either. This disc is rechargeable and comes with a USB Type C to C cable for fast and convenient charging. In just 30 minutes, you'll be ready to play for up to a thousand throws or enjoy a full 90-minute match. Plus, its lightweight design, weighing only 175 grams, makes it easy to throw and catch.

Designed to meet professional ultimate standards, the TOSY Flying Disc is perfect for night play, freestyle tricks, and disc games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes. Its high durability and waterproof design ensure it can withstand any weather conditions or intense gameplay.

Whether you're looking for a fun Christmas, birthday, or camping gift for men, boys, teens, or kids, the TOSY Flying Disc is guaranteed to bring hours of entertainment and excitement. Get ready to elevate your outdoor play with this game-changer disc. Order yours today and experience the thrill of the TOSY Flying Disc!
